title: I switched to a solid-state portable battery for a week - now lithium-ion feels outdated
contentSnippet: The BMX SolidSafe 5K wireless power bank ditches lithium-ion batteries for solid-state batteries, and it's good to know why.
content: The BMX SolidSafe 5K wireless power bank ditches lithium-ion batteries for solid-state batteries, and it's good to know why.
